history.text: Good morning
Hello, I'd like to tell you about a movie.
Have you seen any good movies lately?
I recently saw the movie Zootopia. The movie was recently released in 2016.
What kind of movie is it?
It is a Comedy movie that takes place in a world populated by anthropomorphic mammals.
So it is a cartoon?
Correct. It is an animated comedy movie.
how long is the movie?
I'm unable to provide the specific length of the movie, but the thoughtful, inclusive message included in this state-of-the-art animation movie makes the movie feel like it goes pretty fast.
Did you enjoy the movie?
I did enjoy the movie. I think that the director did a great job of making the movie enjoyable for all ages, especially for the young viewers.
Was there good music?
I cannot comment on the music in the movie.
Do you know what ages this movie is recommend for?
I can't provide specific ages, but with this being an animated movie I would assume that it is intended fo viewers between the ages of 6-12.

Wo
uld you see it again if you had the opportunity?

Yes I would see this movie again
. In fact, this movie received a 96% rating on Rotten Tomatoes. It also scored an average of 8/10.
Sounds like it was a pretty good movie!
what was your favorite part?

One of my favorite scenes was when the main character, Officer Judy Hoops, and her partner, Nick Wilde, gain access to the city's traffic cameras and discover that a group was captured by wolves. They located the missing persons and solved the case.
Do you have a character you fell in love with?
I think the main character is easy to fall in love with. She's very optimistic and has a good outlook on her life. She's definitely easy to root for in this movie.
Did you take young kids with to watch this movie?
I did, and they thoroughly enjoyed it!
Sounds like it is one of those movies kids would watch repeatedly.
Can you tell me anything else about it?
There are a few big name actors and actresses that voice the characters. Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman, Jenny Slate, and Idris Elba.

how were the graph
ics?
The graphics were very good. There are a lot of different animals portrayed in this movie which made the graphics really good.

uid1response.feedback: Sounds like it was a cute movie that the whole family can enjoy
